1372: Kerolus was born in Die Coninc straet in 1372.
1385: Lost sibling Siabbo in 1385 when Siabbo was 9.
1386: Lost father at the age of 14.
1391: Got married to Heile at age 20 in 1391.
Kerolus moved to Muelen straet.B.4 after marriage.
1393: Lost daughter Heile when Heile was 0 years old.
Heile gave birth to their stillborn daughter Heile in 1393.
1395: Had a son with Heile, Kybben, at age 23.
1396: Lost his wife Heile while she was giving birth to Machtilden in 1396.
Lost mother at the age of 24.
Became caretaker of Kybben, Machtilden at age 25.
1397: Got married a second time to Saxiardis at age 26 in 1397.
Had Saxiardis move in at Muelen straet.B.4 after marriage.
1398: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Folqui, at age 26.
1399: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Marisseis, at age 27.
Lost sibling Hersewindis in 1399 when Hersewindis was 25.
